PermItemEntry.name: FireRune
PermItemEntry.description: A rune crackiling with magic, unlocks the fireball uses the O key to fire. This item is permanent.

PermItemEntry.name: IceRune
PermItemEntry.description: A rune ice cold with arcanic energy, unlocks the frost wave uses the S key and O key to summon it. This item is permanent.

PermItemEntry.name: WindRune
PermItemEntry.description: A breezey rune with runic powers, unlocks the wind sheathe uses O key in the air to soar with it. This item is permanent.

PermItemEntry.name: MithrilBangil
PermItemEntry.description: An enchanted Bangil that makes the user feel stronger.This item is permanent.

PermItemEntry.name: ruby bracelet
PermItemEntry.description: A bracelet empowered by magic. This item is permanent.
